transcript: Hi, this is Carlos Riz and I'm calling because I stopped taking metformin because it makes me dizzy

key_facts: Patient stopped taking metformin due to dizziness
result.recommended_next_step: Pharmacist outreach within 24 hours to address side-effect concern and adherence barrier.
result.safe_patient_reply: Thank you for sharing. I will pass along your concerns to our pharmacist. They will contact you to discuss your medication plan. If symptoms worsen or you feel unsafe, please seek urgent care.

soap_note.subjective: Patient reports experiencing dizziness while taking metformin
soap_note.assessment: Patient discontinued metformin due to side effect
soap_note.plan: Review medication history and discuss potential alternative treatments with pharmacist

pharmacist_task.summary: Patient discontinued metformin due to dizziness, review medication history and discuss alternative treatments
